document.full_text: a journalist who claimed that dominique strauss-kahn tried to rape her during an interview in 2002 now plans to file the legal complaint against him that she decided against nine years ago.
document.title: 'i didn't wish to be the girl who had a problem ...'
lines_and_colors: a journalist who claimed that dominique strauss-kahn tried to rape her during an interview in 2002 now plans to file the legal complaint against him that she decided against nine years ago.
